QuestData.Title: Stones of Power
QuestData.Description: Many thousands of years ago, the rulers of the Vale sought energy from a powerful crystal known as Revelite.$B$BWith this substance, they were able to power cities, factories, and engines of war.$B$BZhi the Harmonious has asked us to collect some crystals and bring them back to the city.$B$BKeep an eye out for them while you are in the ruins.
